name: Mirrors of Grimaldi
description:
51st and Fire is comprised of eight college seniors from Drexel University who created Mirrors of Grimaldi as their senior design project. This lead the team to GDC to compete in Intel's University Games Showcase against other top game design schools in the country, ultimately taking home 1st place for best gameplay:

Although the team has graduated, Mirrors of Grimaldi is not over and will soon be up on Steam Greenlight! If Greenlit, Mirrors of Grimaldi will once again go into full production and add new features like more maps, characters, and tower effects that will make this project a completely realized product.

If you like what you see, support us on Steam Greenlight! If you have any trouble with the game, or would like to report a bug, please feel free to use our Bug Tracker: HERE
